Base Legal de la firma electr\u00f3nica: Legal Basis of the electronic signature ( Law 59/2003, of December 19 )
La firma electr\u00f3nica es el conjunto: The electronic signature is the set of data in electronic form, consigned together with others or associated with them, which can be used as a means of identifying the signer.
La firma electr\u00f3nica avanzada es la: The advanced electronic signature is the electronic signature that allows the signer to be identified and to detect any subsequent change in the signed data, which is uniquely linked to the signer and the data to which it refers and which has been created by means that the signer can maintain. under its sole control.
Se considera firma electr\u00f3nica reco: A recognized electronic signature is considered an advanced electronic signature based on a recognized certificate and generated by a secure signature creation device.
La firma electr\u00f3nica reconocida ten: The recognized electronic signature will have, with respect to the data consigned in electronic form, the same value as the handwritten signature in relation to those consigned on paper.
Al proceso de firma del documento se han: The general criteria corresponding to advanced signature have been applied to the document signing process.
La integridad del documento firmado: The integrity of the signed document
Se ha garantizado el no repudio en el or: Non-repudiation at origin has been guaranteed
La plataforma <strong>:app<\/strong>, ha: The :app platform has acted as a trusted third party in this process by means of a secure signature creation application.
Ley <strong>59\/2003<\/strong>, de 19 de: Law 59/2003 , of December 19 https : // firmaelectronica .gob.es / Home / Citizens / Base-Legal.html

Un correo electr\u00f3nico ha sido envia: An email has been sent to the email address provided.
En el mismo encontrar\u00e1 un bot\u00f3: In it you will find a button where you can click to proceed with the validation of your user account.
Sentimos que haya rechazado participar e: We are sorry that you have refused to participate in this process.
Puede ponerse en contacto con su creador: You can contact its creator if you want to do it again
Debe firmar las p\u00e1ginas indicadas: You must sign the indicated pages
Firme en cada regi\u00f3n del documento: Sign in each region of the document identified
Si se equivoca puede pulsar la papelera: If you make a mistake you can press the trash to delete the signature area
El usuario quiere que realice una grabac: The user wants you to record the screen, but your mobile device does not allow it
Puede realizar esta validaci\u00f3n desd: You can perform this validation from a desktop computer to meet this requirement
